addEditProductForm.available_online: Is available during the online Chaîne de Rentrée
addEditProductForm.onsite: Will only be available during the onsite Chaîne de Rentrée
addEditProductForm.question: Question for users who take the product

addEditVariantForm.multiple: Can be bought as many times as desired
addEditVariantForm.related_membership_added_duration: Duration of membership added (format: 'AYBMCD' for A year(s), B month(s) and C day(s))

curriculumFormSchema.name: Please enter the name of the curriculum

info.cautionDescription: If you are taking a place at the Integration Weekend (WEI), please provide a deposit cheque for €100 made out to « <payable>AEECL - WEI</payable> ».
info.cautionInstructions: On the back, write "First name Last name - WEI {year}". This cheque will only be cashed in the event of damage to the WEI buses.
info.cautionInstructions2: A second deposit for the WEI site is to be deposited on the following site: <link></link>. This is a deposit by bank imprint, so no amount will be debited unless damage is noted.
info.cautionMandatory: Both deposits are <mandatory>mandatory</mandatory> to participate in the WEI.
info.cdrOnsiteDescription: You'll be able to meet associations, express your interest in proposed activities and ask any questions you may have.
info.cdrOnsiteMandatoryWarning: In the event of a major unavailability, please contact the Student Council (BDE) as soon as possible to find an alternative solution:
info.cdrOnsiteSubtitle: Following this online Chaîne de Rentrée, you will be called in the onsite Chaîne de Rentrée: <mandatory>your presence at the onsite Chaîne de Rentrée is mandatory</mandatory> to validate your purchases.
info.element: A Matrix instance is hosted on campus. This will enable you to communicate easily with other students in a secure, end-to-end encrypted way. To access it :
info.elementStep1: Download Element-x application on your phone
info.elementStep2: On the application choose "Change account provider" ("Changer de fournisseur de compte") then "Continue" ("Continuer")
info.elementStep4: You can then log in with your MyECL account
info.facebook: The majority of the campus' communication takes place via Facebook groups. New students can join the group 'Admis {year}' to make sure they don't miss any information:
info.myECL: The MyECL application is essential to student life at Centrale, it is mandatory to pay during numerous events (especially at the bar) and it will allow you to access plenty of services (the events calendar, the schedule of the film club, room reservations, and so forth).

introCarouselItem.contact: If you have any problems or questions, please do not hesitate to contact the Student Council (Bureau Des Élèves):
introCarouselItem.description: This website allows you to join associations (student clubs), to pay the handouts of lessons and to take your ticket for the orientation weekend (WEI). This will save you precious time during the second part of the Chaîne de Rentrée which will take place in face-to-face. At the end of the process, you will be brought to pay online by credit card.
introCarouselItem.selectCurriculum: To start, please select your curriculum:
introCarouselItem.welcome: Welcome to Centrale Lyon's associative Chaîne De Rentrée.

login.contact: If you have any problems or questions, please do not hesitate to contact the Student Council (Bureau Des Élèves):
login.description: Welcome to Centrale Lyon's associative Chaîne De Rentrée. This website, designed for new, current and gap-year students, will allow you to join associations and subscribe to the school's associative services.
login.selectPromotion: Please select your school year to create a MyECL account:
login.title: Chaîne de rentrée {year}
login.usePersonalEmail: If your student e-mail adress is not yet activated, you may use a personal one. You will have to change it as soon as possible.

onValidate.toastErrorDescription: An error occurred while validating the purchase.

page.refusedDescription: Your payment has been refused. You can retry, if the problem persists, please contact us.
page.succeededDescription: Your payment has been made successfully

paymentButton.description: You will be redirected to HelloAsso to proceed to payment. HelloAsso is a French company offering payment solutions for associations. It is financed exclusively by donations. By default, HelloAsso will propose you to make a donation (called 'contribution volontaire' or 'voluntary contribution'), you can refuse to do so without compromising the payment. If you choose to make a donation, only HelloAsso will benefit it.
paymentButton.title: Information about the payment provider
